price: Реци: „Зар од мене тражите да некога другог, поред Аллаха, обожавам, о незналице!“
arabic: قُلۡ أَفَغَيۡرَ ٱللَّهِ تَأۡمُرُوٓنِّيٓ أَعۡبُدُ أَيُّهَا ٱلۡجَٰهِلُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul afaghayra al-lahi tamurūnnī aʿbudu ayyuhā al-jāhilūna
